API Reference#

spy4cast.stypes Module#

Classes#

Slise(lat0, latf, lon0, lonf, month0, ...[, sy])

Dataclass to create a Slise

Month(value)

Enumaration for Months.

F(value)

An enumeration.

RDArgs([dataset_dir, dataset_name, ...])

Dataclass to convientely pass arguements for a ReadData constructor

RDArgsDict

Typed dict to set as as a type and indicate the arguments that should be passes into read_data.ReadData

Variables#

Color

Color type.

T_FORMAT

Time stamp format used internally

TimeStamp

TimeStamp type.

spy4cast.functions Module#

Functions#

set_silence(b)

time_from_here()

time_to_here()

pretty_dict(d)

Returns a string for a given dict :param d: dict :return: str

update_dataset_info_json(data_reader, ...)

get_dataset_info(data_reader, d_dir[, ...])

slise2str(slise)

mon2str(month)

Function to return a month string depending on a month value :param month: Month from enum

str2mon(month)

Function to return a month index depending on its string :param month: Value of the month.

log_error(string[, path])

Function to log an error in the errors foler on y_%y/m_%m/errors_%d.txt :param string: String to be logged :param path: Path to the erros folder, defult is website/log/errors :return:

debugprint(*msgs, **kws)

spy4cast.meteo Module#

Classes#

CrossvalidationOut(zhat, scf, r_z_zhat_t, ...)

MCAOut(RUY, RUY_sig, SUY, SUY_sig, RUZ, ...)

Meteo()

Class containing functions to carry out on the dataset

Variables#

List

A generic version of list.

NAN_VAL

Convert a string or number to a floating point number, if possible.

Tuple

Tuple type; Tuple[X, Y] is the cross-product type of X and Y.

Class Inheritance Diagram#

spy4cast.read_data Module#

Classes#

ReadData([dataset_dir, dataset_name, ...])

This class enables you to load, slice and modify the data in a netcdf4 file confortably.

Variables#

NAN_VAL

Convert a string or number to a floating point number, if possible.
